data.title: Raising Victor Vargas — Charlotte Mecklenburg Library
data.meta_description: Raising Victor Vargas — A self-styled teenage Romeo from Manhattan's Lower East Side is bent on seducing a girl who appears to be well beyond his reach. However, his reputation for seduction, along with the fact that he lives with his grandmother and bothersome brother in a tiny tenement, complicate his plans. Official Selection at **Cannes Film Festival**, nominated for Best Feature & Best Director at the **Film Independent Spirit Awards** "*A gritty but sweet look at young love and family dynamics.*" - ***The San Francisco Chronicle*** "*It is warm, generous, courtly, compassionate and humanistic in the best sense.*" - ***The New York Observer***
data.text:
